DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : BAY 56-3722 may stop growth cancer cell block enzymes necessary tumor cell growth . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness BAY 56-3722 treating patient recurrent , unresectable , metastatic kidney cancer .
DOC.brief_title: BAY 56-3722 Treating Patients With Recurrent , Unresectable , Metastatic Kidney Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine tumor response rate patient recurrent , unresectable , metastatic renal cell carcinoma treat BAY 56-3722 . - Determine duration response , time progression , survival patient treat drug . - Determine qualitative quantitative toxic effect drug patient . - Determine pharmacokinetics drug patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive BAY 56-3722 IV 30 minute day 1-3 . Treatment repeat every 3 week least 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 6 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20-140 patient accrue study .
